title: Magregor v. Mayweather... fought... was abolished after the arrest of Mayweather?
subtitle: An old press report on the arrest of Floyd Mayweather in 2010 appeared under a misleading title in July 2017.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The battle of August 2017 between Floyd Maywether Jr. and Connor McGregor was cancelled after the first arrest in July 2017.
